name: Digital Hazard (itch)
description:
DIGITAL HAZARD

Play the role of a skilled hacker and travel the entire world completing extremely complex missions like stealing money, research data, framing people, and a lot more. It is time to get your hands on your keyboard again, plug in your modem, get connected ... and prepare to face new and exciting challenges in this fast-paced hacker game. If you've ever wondered what lies beneath worldwide computer networking, here is your chance to go into that underground world and play the role of a hacker, in a journey around the world, trying to find the truth about the ESK organization. Packed with awesome graphics, and a great soundtrack from Avenue 5, the game is guaranteed to keep you on the edge of things all the time. With support for custom interface skins, custom game mods/levels/missions, you can always extend your gaming experience and face new challenges, by creating additional missions. You don't have to be an experienced computer user. You will be instructed on how to do things, preparing you to face the most challenging missions. If you are looking for something new, here is your chance with this game. Try something totally new and play on the thin line between reality and fiction.

Features:
- Extensive levels

- 3 different game scenarios that offer an additional 6 levels to play

- 3 different interface skins - Complete techno soundtrack performed by Avenue 5
